name: Elevelabs
short: ElevenLabs is a leading voice AI platform offering ultra-realistic text‑to‑speech, voice cloning, dubbing, and conversational voice agents. With support for 70+ languages, emotion-aware delivery, and low-latency performance, it enables developers to integrate natural audio into apps, audiobooks, games, and accessibility tools via a robust public API.

name: PlayAI
short: PlayAI is a voice-first conversational AI platform offering low-latency text-to-speech, voice cloning, and multi-turn dialogue capabilities. Its flagship models—Play 3.0 mini (fast, multilingual) and PlayDialog (context-aware, emotive)—power interactive voice agents. Developers can integrate via API or SDKs to build natural, human-like voice interfaces.

name: Murf AI
short: Murf AI is a cloud-based AI voiceover platform offering realistic text‑to‑speech, voice cloning, dubbing, and translation across 300+ voices and 33+ languages. Its Studio enables fine-tuning (pitch, emotion, emphasis), real-time editing, and seamless integration with visuals. It supports API access and collaborative video/audio workflows

name: Lovo AI
short: Lovo AI is an advanced text-to-speech and voice cloning platform offering 500+ expressive voices in 100+ languages. It supports custom voice cloning from short clips, auto-subtitling, AI-powered script & image generation, and has a built-in video editor—ideal for creators, educators, and brands.

name: Voice.AI
short: Voice.ai is a real-time AI voice changer and voice cloning platform designed for gamers, streamers, and creators. It lets users transform their voice into various characters or custom voices during live calls, games, or recordings. It supports Windows apps and offers API access for deeper integration.

name: Systhensia
short: Synthesia AI is an enterprise-grade, text-to-video platform that transforms scripts into studio-quality videos using customizable AI avatars and lifelike voiceovers. Supporting 230+ avatars and 140+ languages, it automates video localization, dubbing, captions, and editing. Trusted by Fortune 100 companies, it’s compliant and ethically safe.

name: Runway ML
short: Runway ML is a cloud-based, no-code creative AI suite that empowers artists, designers, and filmmakers to edit and generate images, videos, and audio with ease. It features drag‑and‑drop tools for background removal, motion tracking, text-to-image/video, and real-time collaboration—integrating smoothly with Photoshop, Premiere, Unity, and Unreal ().

name: DeepBrain AI
short: DeepBrain AI is a cutting‑edge video synthesis platform specializing in hyper‑realistic AI avatars and conversational “AI Humans.” It turns text, slides, web pages, or scripts into lifelike videos across 80+ languages using 100+ avatars. It’s widely used for training, marketing, customer service, and virtual agents, with enterprise-grade integration options

name: Canva
short: Canva is an easy-to-use graphic design platform that allows users to create presentations, social media posts, posters, videos, and more. With drag-and-drop tools, templates, AI features, and collaboration support, it’s ideal for beginners and professionals looking to design quickly without needing advanced skills or software.

name: Sora
short: Sora is OpenAI’s text-to-video generative AI, producing short, high-resolution clips (up to 1080p and 20 s) from text, images, or video inputs. Its tools—Remix, Re‑cut, Blend, Loop—enable flexible editing and extension. Initially released in Dec 2024 to ChatGPT Plus/Pro users.

name: Scite
short: Scite AI is an AI-powered research tool that enhances scholarly work by providing Smart Citations—contextualized insights indicating whether a scientific paper is supported, contradicted, or only mentioned in citations. With a database of over 1.2 billion citation statements across 187 million articles, Scite supports advanced search, citation analytics, dashboards, a browser extension, and an AI assistant—all via its API ().

name: Elicit
short: Elicit AI is a smart research assistant designed to streamline literature reviews. It lets you pose questions in natural language, searches a database of over 125 million papers, summarizes findings, extracts key data into structured tables, and generates research questions—saving up to 80% of review time (). It’s ideal for academics, clinicians, and policy analysts seeking efficient, evidence-based insights.

name: Research Rabbit
short: Research Paper AI is an intelligent academic assistant that automates tasks like literature discovery, data extraction, summarization, and citation management. It leverages NLP to scan massive research databases, generate structured summaries, suggest citations, and refine writing. Ideal for scholars, it streamlines workflows and enhances accuracy in scholarly writing

name: Consensus
short: Consensus AI is an AI-powered academic search engine that lets you ask research questions in natural language and instantly get evidence-backed summaries from over 200 million peer-reviewed papers. It features a Consensus Meter to visualize agreement levels, Copilot for deeper insights, Study Snapshots, smart filters, and seamless citation export.

name: Semantic scholar
short: Semantic Scholar is a free, AI‑powered research engine developed by the Allen Institute for AI. It indexes over 220 million academic papers, offering semantic search, AI‑generated TLDR summaries, influential citation detection, personalized research feeds, and an augmented PDF reader (Semantic Reader) to streamline scholarly discovery.

name: Writesonic
short: Writesonic is an AI-powered content creation platform that helps users generate high-quality text for blogs, ads, websites, emails, and more. It supports over 25 languages, offers SEO optimization, tone customization, and integrates with WordPress and Zapier—making it ideal for marketers, writers, and businesses needing fast, effective content creation.

name: Jasper AI
short: Jasper AI is an AI writing assistant designed for marketers, bloggers, and businesses. It helps create high-quality content like blog posts, ads, emails, and social media captions using customizable brand voices, templates, and SEO tools—making content creation faster and more consistent across platforms.

name: Copy. Ai
short: Copy.ai is an AI-powered writing assistant designed to generate marketing copy, blog posts, social media content, email newsletters, and more. Built on GPT‑3, it offers 90+ templates and supports 25+ languages. With intuitive workflows and a built-in plagiarism checker, it streamlines content strategy for individuals and teams efficiently

name: Rytr
short: Rytr is an AI writing assistant that creates blog posts, emails, ads, social media content, and more using GPT‑based models. It offers 40+ templates, custom tones, built‑in plagiarism checking, image generation, chat-based interaction, and integrations (e.g., Semrush, Chrome extension)—streamlining content creation for writers and marketers.

name: Anyword
short: Anyword is an AI writing platform built for marketers, focused on generating high-performing ad copy, landing page text, email campaigns, and social media content. It features predictive performance scoring, audience targeting, brand voice control, and data-driven optimization—helping users create content that drives better engagement and conversion across channels.

name: Canva
short: Canva is an online graphic design platform that enables users to create professional-quality visuals with ease. It offers drag-and-drop tools, templates, stock media, AI-powered features, and team collaboration. Ideal for everything from social media posts to presentations, Canva simplifies design for marketers, students, and businesses—no advanced skills required.

name: Adobe Firefly
short: Adobe Firefly is an AI-powered creative tool by Adobe that generates images, text effects, and design elements from simple text prompts. Integrated with Photoshop and Illustrator, it allows users to enhance creativity with features like generative fill, text-to-image, and style transfer—ideal for designers, marketers, and visual content creators.

name: Design.AI
short: Designs.ai is an AI-powered creative platform that helps users generate logos, videos, social media content, voiceovers, and marketing materials quickly and efficiently. It includes tools like Logomaker, Videomaker, Speechmaker, and Designmaker—making it ideal for startups, marketers, and content creators looking to produce professional visuals with minimal design experience.

name: Khroma
short: Khroma is an AI-powered color palette generator that learns your color preferences after you select 50 favorite hues—and creates infinite, personalized palettes. Viewable as typography, gradients, or custom images, it provides hex/RGB/CSS codes and WCAG accessibility ratings. Searchable by hue or code, and all palettes are savable.

name: Looka
short: Looka is an AI-powered branding platform that helps users create professional logos and complete brand kits effortlessly. By entering your business name and design preferences, Looka generates hundreds of logo options you can customize. It also offers a Brand Kit with 300+ templates for business cards, social media, and marketing assets.

name: Beautiful.AI
short: Beautiful.ai is a smart, cloud-based presentation tool that uses AI-driven templates and real-time design adjustments. It auto-formats layouts, charts, and brand elements as you edit. Features include collaborative editing, DesignerBot for prompt-based slide generation, and seamless exports—enabling users to craft polished presentations quickly without design skills

name: Tome
short: Tome AI is a generative storytelling and presentation platform that lets you craft immersive, multimedia narratives in minutes. It uses AI to generate content outlines, layouts, images (via DALL·E 2), and embeds interactive elements—all on a drag-and-drop canvas. Ideal for pitch decks, lesson plans, and marketing visuals

name: Canva
short: Canva is an online graphic design platform that enables users to create professional-quality visuals with ease. It offers drag-and-drop tools, templates, stock media, AI-powered features, and team collaboration. Ideal for everything from social media posts to presentations, Canva simplifies design for marketers, students, and businesses—no advanced skills required.

name: Pitch
short: Pitch is a modern, collaborative AI-powered presentation platform for teams. It jumpstarts decks with AI-generated outlines or templates, supports real-time editing, brand customization, video recording, and embeds. With robust analytics and integrations (Slack, Notion, HubSpot), Pitch helps create engaging, on-brand presentations quickly and effectively.

name: Midjourney
short: Midjourney is an AI-powered image generation tool that creates stunning visuals from text prompts. Known for its artistic and imaginative style, it’s widely used by designers, marketers, and creatives. Accessible through Discord, Midjourney offers limited free trials and paidplans, making it a popular choice for AI-generated art.

name: DALL·E 3
short: DALL·E 3 is OpenAI’s advanced text-to-image model with exceptional prompt understanding, producing highly detailed, coherent visuals—including accurate rendering of hands, faces, and text. Integrated into ChatGPT Plus, it supports iterative tweaks and safety filters, and is accessible via the OpenAI Image API.

name: Canva AI
short: Canva AI is an AI-powered design assistant within Canva that helps users create stunning visuals effortlessly. It offers features like Magic Design, Magic Write (AI text generation), and AI image generation. Ideal for social media, presentations, and marketing, Canva AI simplifies design for beginners and professionals without needing advanced skills.

name: Remove.bg
short: Remove.bg is an AI-powered tool that automatically removes backgrounds from images in seconds. It’s widely used for e-commerce, marketing, design, and personal projects. With support for batch processing, plugins (Photoshop, Figma), and integrations via API, it helps users create clean, professional-looking images without needing manual editing or advanced skills.

name: ChatGPT
short: ChatGPT is an AI-powered conversational assistant developed by OpenAI. It understands and generates human-like text, enabling users to ask questions, get writing help, code assistance, and more. Based on advanced language models, ChatGPT is widely used for productivity, learning, and creativity across various fields.

name: Dialogflow
short: Dialogflow is Google’s AI-powered conversational platform used to build chatbots, voice assistants, and virtual agents. It supports natural language understanding (NLU), multi-language support, and integrates with platforms like Google Assistant, WhatsApp, websites, and mobile apps. Developers can create context-aware, interactive experiences for customer service, sales, and support using its intuitive interface.

name: ManyChat
short: ManyChat is an AI-powered chatbot platform that automates conversations across Facebook Messenger, Instagram, WhatsApp, SMS, and email. With a no-code flow builder, AI-driven intent recognition, templates, and analytics, it boosts lead generation, customer support, and marketing engagement for businesses of all sizes.

name: Botpress
short: Botpress is a powerful, open-source conversational AI platform enabling the creation of advanced chatbots and AI agents. It features a visual Agent Studio, LLM-based autonomous conversation engine, and support for custom knowledge bases. It integrates across Slack, WhatsApp, and more, with REST API/SDKs for full deployment and control.

name: Mailchimp
short: Mailchimp is an all-in-one email marketing and automation platform designed for businesses to create, send, and analyze campaigns. It offers tools for audience segmentation, A/B testing, pre-built templates, analytics, and customer journey automation. Mailchimp also supports social media ads, landing pages, and e-commerce integrations to drive business growth

name: Sendinblue
short: Sendinblue (Brevo) is an all‑in‑one marketing platform powered by AI. It excels in email/SMS automation, chat, and CRM, featuring AI-driven tools like predictive send‑time optimization, subject-line testing, behavior-based segmentation, and campaign personalization. It integrates web chat and WhatsApp and supports multi-channel marketing.

name: ConvertKit
short: ConvertKit AI enhances email marketing for creators by using AI to power behaviors-based automation, suggest optimal send times, generate compelling subject lines and content, and segment audiences. With visual workflows and deep e‑commerce integrations, it streamlines growth-focused campaigns. Ideal for bloggers, course creators, and small businesses.

name: Pictory
short: Pictory AI is a video creation tool that transforms text, blog posts, or scripts into engaging videos using AI. It offers automatic captioning, voiceovers, and stock footage integration. Ideal for marketers, educators, and content creators, Pictory simplifies video editing without requiring advanced skills or software.

name: Lumen5
short: Lumen5 is an AI-powered video creation platform that converts text—like blog posts, scripts, or URLs—into polished videos using drag-and-drop templates, stock media, and automatic scene/storyboard generation. Designed for marketers, educators, and creators, it streamlines social media, ads, and explainer video production with brand customization.

name: GitHub Copilot
short: GitHub Copilot is an AI coding assistant developed by GitHub and OpenAI. It offers context-aware code and function suggestions, explanations, and chat support directly within IDEs like VS Code, JetBrains, Neovim, and Visual Studio. This “AI pair programmer” boosts productivity—studies show ~55% faster coding—and supports issue-based autonomous bug fixes.

name: Tabnine
short: Tabnine is an AI-driven coding assistant that enhances developer productivity by offering context-aware code completions, whole-line suggestions, refactoring help, test generation, and chat-based code exploration. It integrates into major IDEs (VS Code, JetBrains, Eclipse), ensures code privacy, and supports customization through cloud or on-premise deployments.

name: Kite
short: Kite AI is an AI-powered coding assistant that enhances developer productivity by offering intelligent code completions, suggestions, and documentation insights directly in IDEs like VS Code, PyCharm, and Atom. Trained on millions of code examples, it supports multiple languages and reduces repetitive coding, helping users write cleaner, faster code effortlessly.

name: Notion
short: Notion AI is an intelligent writing assistant integrated into Notion, helping users generate, summarize, and edit content. It streamlines note-taking, task management, and documentation with smart suggestions and automation. Ideal for students, professionals, and teams, it enhances productivity directly within Notion’s all-in-one workspace.

name: Reclaim AI
short: Reclaim.ai is an AI-powered smart calendar assistant that automatically schedules and reschedules tasks, habits, meetings, and breaks. It syncs across Google and Outlook calendars and integrates with tools like Asana, Todoist, Jira, and Slack, protecting focus time and work-life balance through intelligent priority-based planning.

name: Clockwise
short: Clockwise AI is a smart calendar assistant powered by GPT. It optimizes your schedule by automatically reshuffling meetings, protecting focus time, and blocking breaks. Accessible via chat and Slack, it syncs with Google and Outlook, balancing personal, team, and company preferences for seamless, uninterrupted productivity.

name: Photomath
short: PhotoMath is a smart camera calculator that scans printed or handwritten math problems and instantly delivers step-by-step solutions—from arithmetic to calculus. It uses optical character recognition and built‑in math solvers, breaking down concepts visually to support learning and understanding anytime, anywhere

name: Wolfram Alpha
short: Wolfram Alpha is a powerful computational knowledge engine that uses AI and symbolic computation to answer questions, perform calculations, analyze data, and generate visualizations. It supports subjects like math, physics, chemistry, history, and finance. Used in education and research, it powers Siri and other intelligent systems with curated, computable data.

name: Symbolab
short: Symbolab is an AI-powered math solver that provides step-by-step solutions to problems in algebra, calculus, trigonometry, geometry, and more. Users can input equations via text or camera, and Symbolab breaks them down using symbolic computation and rule-based logic. It’s widely used by students, educators, and developers for learning and practice.

name: Mathway
short: Mathway is an AI-powered math solver that lets users snap or type equations—ranging from basic arithmetic to calculus and physics—and delivers instant, step-by-step solutions. With over 5 billion problems solved and 50 million+ downloads, it’s a top tool for students, educators, and professionals seeking quick, reliable math help

name: Grammarly
short: Grammarly AI is an intelligent writing assistant that enhances grammar, spelling, style, and tone in real time. Integrated across browsers, desktop apps, and mobile, it also offers generative features like paraphrasing, drafting, and tone adjustment through GrammarlyGO. Trusted by millions for clear, professional writing

name: Quillbot
short: QuillBot AI is a versatile writing assistant that uses AI to paraphrase, summarize, check grammar, detect plagiarism, generate citations, translate, and even identify AI‑written content. Its intuitive web interface and browser extensions support students, writers, and professionals in crafting clearer, polished text efficiently.

name: Otter.ai
short: Otter.ai is an AI-powered transcription and meeting assistant that automatically records, transcribes, and summarizes conversations from meetings, interviews, lectures, and more. It features real-time speaker identification, slide capture, action-item extraction, and integrations with Zoom, Google Meet, Slack, Salesforce, and other platforms—making voice notes searchable and collaborative across teams.

name: Descript
short: Descript AI is a cloud-based audio and video editing platform that lets users edit content like a document. It offers features like transcription, filler-word removal, studio-quality sound, overdub voice cloning, screen recording, and AI-powered video creation with visuals, avatars, and smart transitions—all in one intuitive workspace

name: Krisp
short: Krisp is an AI-powered noise cancellation tool that removes background noise, echo, and voice interruptions from calls in real time. It works with Zoom, Teams, Meet, and other apps to ensure crystal-clear audio. Ideal for remote work, podcasts, and meetings, Krisp enhances voice clarity without hardware or plugins.

name: Copyleaks
short: Copyleaks AI is an AI-powered platform for advanced plagiarism and AI-generated content detection. It scans text, code, and images across billions of sources, providing over 99% accuracy in detecting AI writing and ensuring academic and IP compliance. It offers detailed similarity reports, AI-probability scores, multi-language support, and integration options.
Free Plan: Basic plagiarism check with word limit

name: Fireflies.ai
short: Fireflies AI is a meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes conversations from virtual meetings. It integrates with platforms like Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams to capture discussions, generate action items, and provide searchable transcripts—boosting productivity and collaboration for teams by making meeting insights easily accessible.

name: Replika
short: Replika AI is a personalized AI companion chatbot trained using your interactions. You customize its avatar, voice, and relationship role—friend, mentor, or partner—and it grows with you, offering empathetic conversations, mood tracking, guided self-reflection, and AR/voice experiences. It’s designed for emotional support and personal growth

name: Slidesgo
short: Slidesgo offers a vast collection of free, professionally designed templates for Google Slides, PowerPoint, and Canva—with styles ranging from minimalist and educational to business and marketing. Its AI Presentation Maker turns text into slide decks instantly. Perfect for educators, students, and professionals needing fast, polished presentations.

name: Durable
short: Durable AI is an all‑in‑one AI platform for small businesses, offering lightning-fast website creation, brand identity generation, blog building, built-in CRM, invoicing, SEO, and marketing tools. It generates fully functional, customizable sites in ~30 seconds, designed for non-technical users

name: Cleanup.pictures
short: Cleanup.pictures is an AI-powered image editing tool that removes unwanted objects, people, watermarks, text, or blemishes from photos with a simple brush. Using advanced inpainting, it seamlessly fills in the background, making images clean and professional. It’s ideal for photographers, marketers, and designers needing quick and easy photo cleanup.

name: Gamma
short: Gamma AI is an AI-powered content creation tool for generating presentations, documents, and webpages in seconds. It uses natural language prompts to craft polished designs, interactive “cards,” analytics, and collaboration—all without design or coding skills. It supports branding, multimedia, templates, and live sharing.

name: Puzzle Labs
short: Puzzle Labs is an AI-powered glossary and knowledge management tool that automatically extracts, defines, and links jargon or key concepts from your existing content. It creates dynamic glossaries and embeds easily into websites, docs, or portals, helping audiences understand complex terminology in context.

name: ChatPDF
short: ChatPDF is an AI-powered document assistant that lets you upload PDFs (and similar formats) to chat with them. Ask questions, summarize sections, get targeted answers with citations, and analyze multiple documents simultaneously. Ideal for students, researchers, or professionals to quickly extract insights from dense material.

name: Lovable.AI
short: Lovable AI is an AI-powered web and app builder that generates full-stack applications from plain English prompts—handling frontend (React/Tailwind), backend logic, databases, authentication, deployment, and custom domains. It supports integrations (e.g., Supabase, Stripe), real-time collaboration, GitHub sync, and live previews—ideal for rapid prototyping

name: Framer AI
short: Framer AI is a no‑code, AI-enhanced platform for designing and publishing interactive websites in seconds. By entering a text prompt—like “personal portfolio” or “agency landing page”—AI suggests layouts, color palettes, typography, and copy. It includes tools for localization, animations, responsive design, and instant content rewriting.

name: Dorik AI
short: Dorik AI is a no-code, AI-powered website builder that turns simple prompts into complete, responsive websites. It auto-generates SEO-optimized copy, layouts, and images (via DALL·E 3), while offering drag‑and‑drop customization, white‑label CMS, Airtable/Stripe/PayPal integrations, and exportable clean code—all without coding
